original: 關羽水淹七軍，樊城告急，甚至令曹操考慮遷都；激勵城中數千人必死迎戰，直至徐晃來救，迫關羽退走。
text: Guan Yu flooded the Seventh Army, Fan Cheng was in a hurry, and even made Cao Cao consider moving the capital; thousands of people in the city were inspired to fight to the death, until Xu Huang came to rescue and forced Guan Yu to retreat.
